Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-0994 affecting package protobuf for versions less than 3.17.3-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-0994 affecting package protobuf for versions less than 3.17.3-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package protobuf is earlier than 3.17.3-5, affected by CVE-2026-0994
